title: password issues
content: The Messaging Co says that after changing my password with them I need to "make sure you update your password in any email application you are using". does that mean in Thunderbird? I can't remember any Thunderbird password, only Firefox. And I can't access anywhere where I can change it without having the original. Any ideas please. And does it mean that the password has to be the same for both Messaging Co and Thunderbird. Thanks
creator: meowngame

title: email not sending after adding more storage
content: I can't stop thunderbird from downloading my IMAP emails every time I start my computer. The emails moved out of archives and I do not know why, then I ran out of storage space, added storage and now Thunderbird want to upload (again)--(it is over six years of emails)
creator: walkingpearl2

title: thunderbird download page for windows 7 shows 404 page error
content: I use google search engine. Google is blocking my email account and wants personal identifying info to unblock. One solution recommended is to have my mail data transferred elsewhere. I want to use Thunderbird for my mail. On Thunderbird's download page for Windows 7, an error 404 comes up. Where is the download page? Thanks.
creator: frrancesca04

title: Email storage
content:
I like to keep important emails. I've created a bunch of folders to put them in but it says my mailbox is full. I don't have any new emails. So do we have a limit of how many emails we can keep even if they're in folders? Thanks

Fiona frtreble@optusnet.com.au
creator: frtreble

title: Updated to Nebula and all of my inbox emails have disappeared.
content:
I just updated to Nebula and all of my inbox emails (from gmail) have disappeared.

All of the other folders are intact, including the sent folder. I also have another email account in this client (my work email) and these are also fine. It's only affected my gmail inbox messages.

I'm using this email for job applications currently so would really appreciate help figuring out how I recover my emails. Thank you!
creator: onlinebigbird

title: account unico per Thunderbird
content: Da diversi anni utilizzo Mozilla e appena possibile ho creato un account per uniformare il modus su tutte le stazione in ufficio e a casa. Con l'introduzione della beta Thunderbird per android vorrei fare lo stesso e uniformare il software tra cellulari e pc. Ãˆ possibile creare account come con Firefox?
creator: f.pongetti

title: wachtwoord thunderbird
content: het wachtwoord van Thunderbird doet het niet meer. Ik kan niet meer bij de mails. Sinds 18 september niets meer binnen gekomen. Hoe kan dat? Hopelijk hebben jullie een oplossing voor dit probleem. met vriendelijke groet, Gonny Leenders. 06-22506923 p.S. : ik ontvang geen emails. Graag antwoord via SMS
creator: gonny2
